title: Tenjho Tenge, Volume 1
description: In a school dominated by ruthless martial art teams, one rogue club must fight the odds to stay alive!At the toughest high school in Tokyo, only the strong survive.In one unusual school, education takes a backseat to brawling, as warring clubs wreak havoc in the hallways and chaos in the classrooms, all in a bid to be the coolest club in school! Although they often contribute their fair share of chaos, only one group of students stems the tide of violence in this untames outpost: the Juken Club!
author: Oh! Great
